summary: This is an email chain from July 10, 2019, between Bureau of Prisons psychologists discussing the status of Jeffrey Epstein, who was taken off psychological observation and placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The emails also inquire about another inmate, Tartaglione.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email chain; discussed as being taken off psychological observation and placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU).

persons.name: Tartaglione
persons.context: Another inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center whom the email author asks if he was seen.

events.title: Epstein moved to SHU
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was taken off psychological observation and placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The email is dated July 10, 2019, less than a month before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein was removed from psychological observation and placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU).
The email references a need for a 'POFU' (possibly a psychological or psychiatric order/form) for Epstein the following day.
The correspondence is between psychologists/employees of the Federal Bureau of Prisons at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
Another inmate, Tartaglione, is mentioned, indicating the psychologists were managing multiple cases.
